description:
THE GOLF CLASSIC
This course provides students with the fundamentals of project management.
 

THE ADVANCED COURSE
This course will deepen and implement project management tools (prepare a study of investment, establish a schedule, to synthesize a meeting).
 

THE COURSE TEAM
At the end of the "course" of MOOC ABC project management, we propose to students who wish to practice the knowledge acquired. To this we must work remotely and team design project. This work provides a third certificate, called a "certificate by project team



                                            Syllabus
                        
Week 1: Fundamentals of management and organization projects
Week 2: Use internet tools, financially evaluate a project
Week 3: Mastering the basics of organization:  negotiating objectives, manage meetings, make reports and distribute work
Week 4: Advanced Tools project management:  design, planning, budget ...
title: ABC De La Gestion de projet
